text: Iwe muporofita! Kana vakadzi vanotenda vauya kwauri vachikupa Bai’ah (Mhiko), kuti havasi kuzosanganisa chimwe chinhu naAllah, havasi kuzoba, uye kuti havasi kuzoita cheupombwe, uye kuti havasi kuzouraya vana vavo, uye kuti havasi kuzombotaura manyepo vachinyepa kuti vana vavainavo ndevevarume vavo, uye kuti havasi kuzorega kukuteerera pane izvo zvakana (Islaam), chitambira Mhiko (Bai’ah) dzavo kwauri, uye vokumbira Allah kuti vavaregerere. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoregerera zvikuru, vane tsitsi dzakanyanya
